translations.Your client is not authorized to connect: Your client is not authorised to connect. Please inform the administrator of your client.
translations.Your redirect URL needs to be a full URL: Your redirect URL needs to be a full URL for example: https://yourdomain.com/path
translations.Allows OAuth2 compatible authentication: Allows OAuth2 compatible authentication from other web applications.
translations.The OAuth2 app allows administrators to: The OAuth2 app allows administrators to configure the built-in authentication workflow to also allow OAuth2 compatible authentication from other web applications.
translations.OAuth 2.0 allows external services to re: OAuth 2.0 allows external services to request access to {instanceName}.
translations.Name: Name
translations.Make sure you store the secret key, it c: Make sure you store the secret key, it cannot be recovered.
